General.Name: Sam Yang Foods
General.Description: Samyang Foods Co., Ltd. produces various food products in South Korea. It offers noodles, snacks, dairy products, sauces, agro-fishery products, and beef products. The company also exports noodles/snacks to the United States, Canada, Argentina, Paraguay, and Chile; China, Singapore, Japan, Malaysia, Vietnam, and Hong Kong; the United Kingdom, Germany, Spain, Sweden, and the Netherlands; Australia, New Zealand, Samoa, and Micronesia; and Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, and the United Arab Emirates, as well as dairy products to china. The company was founded in 1961 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
